original_text: Then David and his men, who were about six hundred, arose and departed from Keilah, and they went wherever they could go. When Saul was told that David had escaped from Keilah, he gave up the expedition.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 사람 육백 명 가량이 일어나 그일라를 떠나서 갈 수 있는 곳으로 갔더니 다윗이 그일라에서 피한 것을 어떤 사람이 사울에게 말하매 사울이 가기를 그치니라

sentences.original_text: and they went wherever they could go
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 갈 수 있는 곳으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: that David had escaped from Keilah
